exact_matches.webpack-dev-server: Webpack development server with hot reloading
exact_matches.nodemon: Node.js development tool with automatic restart
exact_matches.rails: Ruby on Rails web application framework
exact_matches.vite: Vite build tool and development server
exact_matches.bun: Bun JavaScript runtime and package manager
exact_matches.gatsby: Gatsby static site generator development server
exact_matches.astro: Astro static site generator development server
exact_matches.remix: Remix full-stack web framework development server
exact_matches.poetry: Python dependency management and packaging tool
exact_matches.sidekiq: Sidekiq background job processor for Ruby
exact_matches.nginx: High-performance web server and reverse proxy
exact_matches.caddy: Caddy web server with automatic HTTPS
exact_matches.traefik: Traefik reverse proxy and load balancer
exact_matches.dscl: macOS directory service command line utility
exact_matches.rdesktop: RDP client for Windows Terminal Services

pattern_matches.description: Task runner or CI runner service

fallback_descriptions.development: Development tool, build system, or testing framework (likely safe to terminate during development)
fallback_descriptions.system: System service, daemon, or background process (exercise caution - may be critical for system operation)
fallback_descriptions.database: Database server, caching system, or data storage service (terminating may cause data loss or service disruption)
fallback_descriptions.webServer: Web server, API service, or HTTP-related application (terminating will stop web service availability)
fallback_descriptions.other: Unknown application or service (exercise extreme caution - verify purpose before terminating)
